ext.description: A lightweight VS Code extension that provides a clear and eye-friendly background highlight for the current active line.
config.title: Focus Highlight
config.theme.description: Select a built-in highlight theme. Custom styles take precedence if configured.
config.customBackgroundColor.description: Custom background color (e.g., rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) or #ffffff1a). Leave empty to use preset values.
config.customBorderColor.description: Custom border color. Leave empty to use preset values.
config.showGutterIcon.description: Show colored vertical bar in the gutter (line number area) for highlighted lines.
config.showBottomBorder.description: Show a bottom border for the highlighted line.
config.bottomBorderWidth.description: Width of the bottom border (e.g., 1px, 2px). Max recommended is 5px to avoid exceeding line height.
config.bottomBorderStyle.description: Style of the bottom border (solid, dashed, etc.).
config.customBottomBorderColor.descripti: Custom color for the bottom border. Leave empty to use preset values.
theme.strikingAmber: Striking Amber - High contrast, quick positioning
theme.highContrast: High Contrast - For accessibility or bright environments
theme.custom: Custom - Use your own defined styles below
